text: hi guys today I'm gonna show you how to
make the perfect baked potato and then
top it with one of my favorite toppings
which is inspired by a BLT so to start
off with you want to heat your oven to
400 degrees and then get your potatoes
prepared I'm poking a few holes in some
russet potatoes russets are great for
baking they're very starchy so they get
really fluffy and lovely when they're
baked brush them with a little bit of
olive oil this helps the skin get nice
and crispy as its baking it's not
completely necessary but we really like
what it adds to the final potato I know
you guys are like and now what what is
she gonna do next where is a trick okay
and then once they are all evenly
brushed but lightly you can season with
just a little bit of salt when they're
seasoned place them directly on the rack
in the oven not on a pan or anything so
bake until they're tender when pierced
with the tip of a knife or a fork about
an hour to an hour and 15 minutes for
the BLT version you need to make like a
creamy dressing I have a quarter cup of
mayonnaise in this bowl to that add a
half a cup of buttermilk whisk your
buttermilk and mayonnaise together and
then season with salt and pepper it's a
really simple dressing but I still think
it's more delicious than buying a creamy
dressing if you wanted to you could add
a little bit of fresh herbs to this some
parsley or a little bit of dill would be
really delicious to have a teaspoon of
salt and a quarter teaspoon of pepper
and that's your dressing for toppings I
have some shredded iceberg lettuce some
have cherry tomatoes and some crumbled
bacon now get your potatoes out of the
oven I'm gonna take one at a time and
here's the trick and I learned this from
Martha herself you take the potato hold
it with a towel because it's really hot
and then just slam it down onto the
counter it what that does is it fluffs
up the inside before you open it up and
it makes it really extra extra fluffy
not sure if you can see this but
this potato is really crispy and that
came from the olive oil that we brushed
on the outside
once you have slammed it down on the
counter with a lot of drama then you can
cut it open should be the most fluffy
most amazing baked potato that you have
ever seen you can fluff it further
whether you're a fork but as you can see
it's already pre fluffed because I
slammed it down on the counter seasoned
the inside with some salt and pepper I'm
adding a little bit of butter I don't
think that that is necessarily needed
for the version for the BLT but I still
like it because if you're gonna do it do
it big then top with some shredded
lettuce as much as you want really this
is up to you you can put out different
toppings and let people top their
potatoes however they want a classic way
that we did in the magazine for our
basic is just butter chives and sour
cream really nice people love that but
if you want to serve this as a meal you
can't get any better than piling
delicious toppings on it and then a
little bit of this dressing and you are
good to go this is the most perfect
baked potato with a BLT topping for
dinner tonight what do you think
mmm I think yes make it tonight if you
like recipes like this and you want more
make sure to click like and subscribe
because we have plenty more where this
came from
